description:
Meleoron (メレオロン) is a chameleon-humanoid Chimera Ant squadron leader and an eccentric pacifist who dislikes fighting or killing, admitting that his fighting strength is on par with a lowly soldier ant. Leaving the colony following the death of Peggy by Meruem, Meleron gradually regained the memories of his past life as a human named Jail (ジェイル) and that Peggy was originally his foster father.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Meleoron
